description: At Antiche Mura, savour contemporary cuisine that takes its inspiration and ingredients from both the land and sea, as well as the passing seasons. Situated behind the historic centre, the restaurant also offers an outdoor space for the summer months and ten simple yet comfortable guestrooms.
